1.text: Trials of Valor are challenging adventures that take you to the uncharted reaches of the Eternium universe.

4.text: In the Trials of Valor, you must defeat your enemies and their boss quickly to gain greater rewards and unlock your next challenge.

7.text: Each time you venture into a Trial, you will find yourself in a different landscape.

11.text: The Trials and the Story are the two faces of Eternium.

15.text: Trials become harder as you advance, and their rewards become greater.

18.text: Eternium is the name given by the philosophers of Elderath to the vast expanse of space and time beyond their sky.

23.text: Great glory awaits the seasoned adventurer. Your deeds will turn to legend, for all other heroes to see.

64.text: ...yet strive further is what heroes do.

99.text: Every end is a beginning, where your trials start anew.
